settings.title: Congrats on completing ReSet, your 1-Day Fasting Kit!
settings.subheading: Take the next step in supporting your journey to healthy aging with our breakthrough 5-Day ProLon Nutrition Program.

settings.title: The nutrition breakthrough of the century
settings.subheading: Your secret to fasting with food - Fasting Mimicking Technology.

settings.title: Join the health trend of fasting with food™.

settings.text: The ProLon Fasting Mimicking Diet is the first and only meal program that has gone through clinical trials at the University of Southern California and been patented for its healthy-aging effects!  This 5-day meal program provides scientifically researched micro- and macro-nutrients in precise quantities and combinations that nourish you, but are not recognized as food by your body and therefore mimics a fasting state!

Cellular Rejuvenation (Autophagy)

A fasting induced miracle of biology called autophagy (which won the Nobel Prize in Medicine in 20), cellular rejuvenation is key to your vibrance, emotions, performance, mental clarity,healthy aging and longevity.

Fat Focused
Weight Loss

Kickstart weight loss (on average 5 pounds), especially belly fat, while protecting lean body mass, (which althletes and performance minded will love). The key is your body thinks your fasting, while you're staying nourished.

Changed Relationship
with Food

In this 5-day journey, ProLon helps you to understand, appreciate, and change your relationship with food. You can successfully function without all the mindless eating and extra calories.

Improved Sense
of Well-being

Your emotional well being is a huge benefit as most people after ProLon feel successful vs the other long term diets that set you up to quit. Feel empowered, rejuvenated, vibrant, and with more mental clarity.

Healthier, Younger
Looking Skin

Clinically shown after 3 cycles of ProLon (15 days total), to reduce fine lines and wrinkles. Your skin is rejuvenating from the insdie out, which users come to love!

Convenient, Fits Into Every Lifestyle

The beauty of ProLon Fasting Nutrition is it is in 5-day cycles. We recommend doing at least 3 cycles a year (only 15 days). You can include ProLon into your already healthy routine with minimal disruption.

settings.title: The creator of Fasting Mimicking Technology - Dr. Valter Longo, Ph.D
settings.text:
Dr. Valter Longo is the Director of the Longevity Institute at the University of Southern California. He is the grandfather of the science of fasting and was named by TIME among the top 50 most influential people in Health.

For the Fasting Mimicking Diet® (FMD), Prof. Longo was awarded the first patent in history for Healthspan. He discovered first how cells sense food and then devised the fasting mimicking formulation, and finally conducted mouse and human trials to test the health benefits of the Fasting Mimicking Diet (FMD).

It is derived from these findings that we are able to bring you ProLon line of products.

settings.title: Healthy Convenience - ProLon fits into your lifestyle.
settings.text:
Get many of the benefits of a 5-day fast without giving up food with ProLon, the first and only patented 5-Day Fasting Mimicking Diet. ProLon gently guides your body into a fasting state to get many of the health benefits that come from long fasts while enjoying delicious meals and tasty snacks. Take your body on a 5-Day journey towards cellular rejuvenation and vibrance.


Day 1 - Transform into a Fasting State


Day 2 - Fat Burning & Ketogenesis


Day 3 - Autophagy - Clean-Up State


Day 4 - Cellular Rejuvenation


Day 5 - Renewal & Change

settings.testimonial: ProLon carries so many weight, metabolic and cellular benefits that not only do I recommend it, but I decided to join the company’s mission full time as Chief Medical Officer
settings.author: Dr. William Hsu, M.D
settings.author_info: Chief Medical Officer, L-Nutra, Former Professor of Medicine, Harvard

settings.testimonial: I love the science supporting ProLon, and I love that the science has been published in multiple peer reviewed journals. It allows me to suggest ProLon with confidence. I have used fasting and time restricted eating in my practice for years; ProLon augments this and takes it to the next level.
settings.author: Dr. Amy Savagian, MD
settings.author_info: Triple Boarded in Internal, Integrative and Obesity Medicine

settings.testimonial: Not only do I recommend ProLon as a frequent nutritional intervention, I’ve done it myself numerous times. I love this product so much, I invested in the company.
settings.author: Dr. Maria Tulpan, M.D

settings.custom_description: Healthy lifestyle, Gut Health, Weight Balance Protocol: 3 times per month
settings.product_description: ProLon Reset provides you a day of innovative nutrition formula that was scientifically tested and patented to feed your body while keeping it in a physiological fasting state. This Nutrition Program induces your body to breakdown fat and use it as fuel, similar to what happens when you water fast.
